summary: A command‑line utility that translates pretrained VQ‑Diffusion models (including the ITHQ dataset) into the Diffusers library format by reading original checkpoints and configurations, adapting VQ‑VAE and transformer components, and exporting a ready‑to‑use VQDiffusionPipeline.
business_intent: Provide a seamless migration path for existing VQ‑Diffusion assets so they can be leveraged within the Diffusers ecosystem, simplifying model deployment, fine‑tuning, and integration in downstream applications.
